newsitem.title: USA: Motorola unveils modem series, configurator.
newsitem.headline: Motorola unveils modem series, configurator.

text.p: Motorola Inc's Information Systems Group said Tuesday its Network Systems Division introduced the 3460 Fast'R modem series with a Windows-based Fast'RVu configurator.
The products allow for the quick configuration, status checking and testing of dozens of computer modems. The series is for use by network managers and systems groups, for example.
With Fast'RVu, the set-up time of up to 128 modems can be reduced by a factor of 10, the company said.
Motorola said the series is offered as an external modem or an internal card.
The suggested price is $595 for the external modem.
The series will be offered in the United States through Motorola's direct sale force and authorized partners. All will be available in late May. Approvals are currently in process worldwide.
